section.title: Sample Mixed-Namespace Content
section.p: It's possible to add elements from other namespaces to the documents, and the skins can be changed to output meaningful representations of them.
In particular, the default Forrest skins allow to add xhtml content to the pages, as in this one
section.warning: The xhtml-namespaced elements will be outputted only for html and xml outputs, and will not render in PDF.
section.note: For now validation is performed with DTDs, so multiple-namespaced documents must be excluded from validation.
